name: Durian: An Adventure of a Shroom
name_original: Durian: An Adventure of a Shroom
description:
Welcome to Durian's adventure, get ready to control our hero in his quest to rescue the princess and her drugs from a gang of Italian plumbers.

To control our hero, follow the list of controls below:

Key arrows:

Up - go into doors or pipes;

Down - squat, go into pipes;

Right - walk right;

Left - walk left;

Z , X  and Space Bar keys:

Z - interact with NPC's ,  grab items , and shoot (when you have a gun);

X - Jump  and continue dialogue during a conversation;

Space Bar - Drop weapons ;

To access the main menu you should press enter and then press Shift to access the option you want.

Maybe you need to turn down your volume during the game, since the engine  puts a very loud music and doesn't let us  turn it off, we are sorry for that.

Add a comment if you need something.

Leave us your opinion on the link below:

https://forms.gle/JDxKCUupy8QkctWx8

Thank you very much for playing our game !
